title.narrative: More women across Africa work in and create jobs in the sector of ICT and coding

description.narrative:
African Girls Can CODE Initiative AGCCI 2018-22 identifies two areas that are critical to achieving the desired objective for girls and women’s empowerment and development:
• Bridging the technological divide by providing tangible programmes to increase women’s access to modern technology.
• Empowerment through access to Education and Employment providing girls and young women with pathways to contribute and participate in material ways to Africa’s innovation, industrialization and growth by mastering ICT.
